column1:
(26) 
The main issues that would be required to address by this court is whether;

(
a) 
The period from 1954 to 1962 [7 years] can be ‘tacked’ onto  the period
from 1979 to 1984 [6 years] in computing the period the Defendants were
in possession for the purpose of prescription.

(b) 
Whether the application of the proviso to Section 3 of the Ordinance arrests
